channel.title: Daily Express :: World Feed
channel.description: Simply The Best 7 Days A Week

item.title: Mystery solved? Plane of vanished pioneer Amelia Earhart 'found' near 'secluded island'
item.description: Archaeologist Dr Rick Pettigrew believes he has spotted Amelia Earhart's missing plane in satellite images - the aviation pioneer vanished 88 years ago
item.author: Katie Oborn,Michael D. Carroll
item.media:keywords: History (section), Aircraft, Amelia Earhart, Fred Noonan, Nikumaroro Island, Lockheed Electra 10-E

media:content.media:description: Amelia Earhart (June 14, 1928) in front of her bi-plane called "Friendship

media:thumbnail.media:description: Amelia Earhart (June 14, 1928) in front of her bi-plane called "Friendship

item.title: Dad drowned baby in bucket of laundry detergent to ‘teach wife a lesson’
item.description: Eliasard Moneus, 29, is to serve 92 years in prison after drowning his baby boy, Jacob, in a vat of detergent
item.author: Emilia Randall,William Morgan
item.media:keywords: Murder, Indiana, Eliasard Moneus, domestic violence, child murder, Indiana sentencing

media:content.media:description: Eliasard Moneus, 29, will likely spend the rest of his life behind bars

media:thumbnail.media:description: Eliasard Moneus, 29, will likely spend the rest of his life behind bars

item.title: Russia becomes the first country to formally recognise Taliban's rule in Afghanistan
item.description: The Russian Foreign Ministry announced that it had received credentials from Afghanistan's newly appointed Ambassador Gul Hassan Hassan.
item.author: Matthew Dooley
item.media:keywords: Russia, Afghanistan, Taliban, Taliban recognition, women's rights restrictions

media:content.media:description: Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov, right, and Acting Foreign Minister of Afghanistan's Taliban movement Amir Khan Muttaqi pose for a photo

media:thumbnail.media:description: Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov, right, and Acting Foreign Minister of Afghanistan's Taliban movement Amir Khan Muttaqi pose for a photo

item.title: Ukraine kills senior Russian General with HIMARS strike
item.description: The Deputy Head of Russia's Navy was killed in a strike near the border with Ukraine.
item.author: Matthew Dooley
item.media:keywords: Russia-Ukraine war, Ukraine, Vladimir Putin, Donald Trump, HIMARS strike, Mikhail Yevgenyevich Gudkov, US-Russia relations, Ukraine conflict

media:content.media:description: The Russian leader was killed near the border with Ukraine.

media:thumbnail.media:description: The Russian leader was killed near the border with Ukraine.

item.title: Da Vinci Code is finally cracked by dentist after 500 years
item.description: Leonardo da Vinci's Vitruvian Man has puzzled scholars for half a millennium.
item.author: Lauran O'Toole
item.media:keywords: Science (section), UK (section), Da Vinci Code, Vitruvian Man, Dr Rory Mac Sweeney, Bonwill's triangle, uk news, science news, Leonardo da Vinci

media:content.media:description: A London based dentist believes he has finally cracked the real Da Vinci Code

media:thumbnail.media:description: A London based dentist believes he has finally cracked the real Da Vinci Code

item.title: Putin's sly dig at Trump as he mocks US Independence Day
item.description: The thinly-veiled insult was made during the latest call between the two world leaders which the Kremlin nevertheless claimed was "frank and businesslike".
item.author: Eleanor Burleigh

media:content.media:description: Putin reminded Trump of Russia's 'role' in helping to secure US independence

media:thumbnail.media:description: Putin reminded Trump of Russia's 'role' in helping to secure US independence

item.title: Russia sends horror WW3 threat to strike Europe - 'We will destroy you'
item.description: A Russian state broadcaster has warned Europe that it is "doomed" to war with Russia.
item.author: Max Parry

media:content.media:description: Russian state TV presenter Vladimir Solovyov

media:thumbnail.media:description: Russian state TV presenter Vladimir Solovyov

item.title: Horror as UK pensioner killed by rampaging elephant
item.description: Police said that the two elderly women, aged 68 and 67, were killed by a female elephant that was with a calf while on a walking safari in Zambia.
item.author: Matthew Dooley
item.media:keywords: Emergency News, Breaking news, UK pensioner, elephant attack, Zambia safari, South Luangwa National Park

media:content.media:description: A family of elephants graze in Kenya, Saturday, May 2, 2020. (AP Photo/Khalil Senosi, File)

media:thumbnail.media:description: A family of elephants graze in Kenya, Saturday, May 2, 2020. (AP Photo/Khalil Senosi, File)

item.title: Chaos for Brits travelling to Europe as thousands hit by delays
item.description: Thousands are being affected today and tomorrow by cancelled flights and delays.
item.author: Jennifer Pinto
item.media:keywords: Flights, Airports, Ryanair, France, France holidays, Air traffic control strike, Flight cancellations, European travel disruption, French air traffic control strike, flight cancellations, European travel disruptions, Ryanair.

media:content.media:description: 1,500 flights are set to be cancelled today and tomorrow

media:thumbnail.media:description: 1,500 flights are set to be cancelled today and tomorrow

item.title: Trump humiliated as Putin issues huge warning over Ukraine
item.description: Vladimir Putin told Donald Trump that Russia was not prepared to "step back from its goals," in Ukraine.
item.author: Charlie Bradley,Conor Wilson,Max Parry,Matthew Dooley
item.media:keywords: Donald Trump, Vladimir Putin, Ukraine, donald trump putin, trump putin call, putin, trump ukraine

media:content.media:description: Trump and Putin spoke for just under an hour

media:thumbnail.media:description: Trump and Putin spoke for just under an hour
